section_a.beneficiaries: The main aim of the company is to undertake robust independent social work assessments to support contact for children of separated families in the home and the community. As parents contemplate the next steps on separation, we step in during court proceedings to ensure the experience is hitch free for children; we will assist with conducting assessments in familiar environments and community surrounding to speed up the process, The company’s activities will provide benefit to... « Separated parents who are going through disputes with regard to contact with their children «® Children from separated families who need contact with their parents provide services to separated families regarding children contact « Councils who administer contact for children from separated | | | | | ® The Courts/Judiciary and other ancillary organisations who | | families | | | | [ LINKINGFAMILIES INDEPENDENT SOCIAL |
